sentence: bring the right purple block to the left side of the red block in the front center
pick up the red block in the front center and stack it on the purple block next to it
attach the middle red block to the left side of the front purple block
rotate the rearmost red block by 45 degrees and align it with the right side of the front purple block
place the yellow block closest to the moved blocks to the left side of the leftmost red block
